property.name: hadoop.kms.re.key.provider.uri
property.description: URI which tells us to store re-encryption keys in memrory

property.name: hadoop.kms.key.provider.uri
property.description: URI of the backing KeyProvider for the KMS.

property.name: hadoop.kms.audit.aggregation.window.ms
property.description: Duplicate audit log events within the aggregation window (specified in ms) are quashed to reduce log traffic. A single message for aggregated events is printed at the end of the window, along with a count of the number of aggregated events.

property.name: hadoop.kms.authentication.type
property.description: Authentication type for the KMS. Can be either "simple" or "kerberos".

property.name: hadoop.kms.authentication.kerberos.keytab
property.description: Path to the keytab with credentials for the configured Kerberos principal.

property.name: hadoop.kms.authentication.kerberos.principal
property.description: The Kerberos principal to use for the HTTP endpoint. The principal must start with 'HTTP/' as per the Kerberos HTTP SPNEGO specification.

property.name: hadoop.kms.authentication.kerberos.name.rules
property.description: Rules used to resolve Kerberos principal names.

property.name: hadoop.kms.authentication.signer.secret.provider
property.description: Indicates how the secret to sign the authentication cookies will be stored. Options are 'random' (default), 'string' and 'zookeeper'. If using a setup with multiple KMS instances, 'zookeeper' should be used.

property.name: hadoop.kms.authentication.signer.secret.provider.zookeeper.path
property.description: The Zookeeper ZNode path where the KMS instances will store and retrieve the secret from.

property.name: hadoop.kms.authentication.signer.secret.provider.zookeeper.connection.string
property.description: The Zookeeper connection string, a list of hostnames and port comma separated.

property.name: hadoop.kms.authentication.signer.secret.provider.zookeeper.kerberos.keytab
property.description: The absolute path for the Kerberos keytab with the credentials to connect to Zookeeper.

property.name: hadoop.kms.authentication.signer.secret.provider.zookeeper.kerberos.principal
property.description: The Kerberos service principal used to connect to Zookeeper.
